input_text:
Job Title: Product Marketing Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Product Marketing Specialist (Remote)

Full-Time | (Remote)

About Supermove

At Supermove, our mission is to make moving faster, cheaper, and delightful for everyone. Supermove gives movers and their customers easy, digital tools to manage their moves, through the power of AI and automation. We built our products through conversations with and feedback from movers who were frustrated with inefficient systems, legacy software, pen and paper. Now, we offer a centralized platform designed to make everything from lead capture to reporting simple, streamlined, and fully digital.

Hundreds of business owners trust Supermove to digitize their moving business, and help them save time, money, and scale their business.

Working with Supermove

We are a customer-driven team that tackles problems with empathy and logical reasoning. We aim to truly solve problems for our customers and accomplish this through a thorough process of problem discovery, user research, user testing, and iteration.

Your Role & Mission

As a Product Marketing Specialist, you will build

Quick Facts

We have closed our series A round raising $18M led by a16z - read more about it here.

Our team comprises of Pinterest, Asana, Facebook, Procore and Uber alums.

We handle millions of dollars of moves each month and we're growing faster than ever.

Role & Responsibilities

You will work with the VP Marketing to level-up Supermove’s position in the market. You will sit at the intersection of marketing, sales, product and customer experience. You will become a product evangelist, helping us meet our revenue targets by effectively demonstrating the value of our products to the market.

As a Product Marketing Specialist at Supermove, you will play a pivotal role in driving the success by effectively positioning and promoting our products in the moving and storage industry. This role requires a strong blend of strategic thinking, product knowledge, customer empathy and marketing expertise. The ideal candidate must be analytical and able to conduct quantitative analyses, but also good at synthesizing and telling a captivating story to different audiences. Experience managing cross-functional projects is essential. Experience with the transportation and/or moving industry is valued.

Understand and support our GTM teams; train them on the problems we solve for our customersCreate compelling and persuasive product marketing collateral, including sales enablement materials, product pages, presentations, website content, and customer stories. Support the development and execution of go-to-market plans for new product launches and expansion into new use casesLead customer research, synthesize insights, and develop deep expertise in target customer segments, verticals, personas, and use casesAnalyze market trends, competitive landscape, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for product optimization and new growth initiativesWork with Marketing to ensure consistent messaging across channels and to develop content for events and speaking opportunitiesCollaborate with cross-functional teams including Product, Sales, Customer Experience, and Marketing to gather product information, conduct market research, and refine messaging and positioning. Measure and analyze the effectiveness of product marketing initiatives, track key performance indicators, and provide actionable insights and recommendations for continuous improvement. 

Competencies

You are an excellent, curious problem solver who starts with why and is able to work relentlessly to remove obstacles and barriers.

You are a great communicator, and enjoy running training and enablement sessions (for both teammates and customers)

You are curious and empathetic to learn about the moving industry and why they can be adverse to change, specifically when it comes to adopting tech.

You are incredibly driven, and willing to run through walls to realize our vision.

You are a really fast learner. You will pick up tools to find speed in execution, ask for help when needed, and be great at managing yourself to get work done and be proud of it.

You bring your personality, interests, and passions to work!

Skills & Experience

1-3 years in a product marketing, sales enablement, or customer success role for a software company. Bonus points if you’ve worked in the moving industry.

Why Join Supermove 

Large amount of ownership within the first 3 months of joining.

Be a part of a fast-growing marketing team with lots of opportunity to grow your career.

Many problems to solve. Our customers' daily operations include hundreds of problems that we could solve.

By being able to lead the market with the best content and resources for the industry.

Why Supermove

We create an organizational culture where we are transparent, people feel comfortable being themselves, ensuring everyone is heard and listened to. As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we mitigate bias across our hiring process: consistent hiring practices and working towards fair treatment, access, and opportunities for all individuals.

All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

You will rewrite an entire industry.

You will introduce innovative technology to redesign the moving industry's daily workflows from the ground up. By coming up with new strategies to grow our customer base, you will provide these businesses time, revenue, and speed – radically uplifting the entire moving experience.

You will likely determine the fate of our company

As one of Supermove's first members of the sales team, you will scale our product to thousands of companies. You have a big upside if we execute well, and we can't do this without you.

You will work with a smart and action-oriented team

At Supermove, we are trying to do what's nearly impossible – to create an enduring and iconic company. We are relentless and ambitious with all of our goals. We move extremely quickly and prefer to iterate rather than deliberate. We always operate with full trust and transparency, knowing that our top priority is to achieve our vision to the best of our ability.

Additional Perks & Benefits

Market comp, medical, vision, dental.

Monthly wellness stipend.

Remote first with shared offices in select cities.

Provide direct input to overall company strategy.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Product Marketing Specialist
job_responsibilities: Support VP Marketing in market positioning
Intersect marketing, sales, product, and customer experience
Develop deep expertise in customer segments
output_json.company_information: Supermove is a company that aims to make moving faster, cheaper, and delightful for everyone. They offer digital tools powered by AI and automation to manage moves.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Supermove is an Equal Opportunity Employer, mitigating bias across the hiring process, ensuring fair treatment, access, and opportunities for all individuals.

other.content: Large amount of ownership, fast-growing marketing team, many problems to solve, leading market with best content and resources, determining company fate, scaling product to thousands of companies, direct input to overall company strategy
Market compensation, monthly wellness stipend, remote-first policy with shared offices, providing direct input to overall company strategy
